releaseNotes:
Version 4.1.5

New Features:
• Control Ayyah playback using Media Player inside Surah Correction.
• Loop individual Ayyahs or the entire Surah for memorization.
• Loop selected Ayyahs to make memorization easier.
• Background playback supported — continue listening with screen off.
• Lock screen media controls available.

Version 4.0.0

Full App Feature Update:
1. Tajweed Rules
2. Surahs Correction
3. Qaida Nuraniyah

InshaAllah this update helps improve your learning experience.
